channel.title: Systolic Array Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Systolic Array Blog

item.title: Writing Something
item.description:
Writing forces you to really think. Well, if your inner critic has high standards then yes, it really forces you to think.

So I am writing this so that the rubber hits the road of writing in this format and exploring what to write about.

Some things I enjoy about writing this in Github are that.

  • This is completely free (I really find it superfluous to be paying for a fancy blog, some elaborate journal social network thing, etc.)
  • Writing in Markdown is very intuitive and is more intimate than the essay style format the closed-source world and mind clings to
  • GitHub enables me to add intuitive version control to my writing

Some things I want to write about

item.title: Writing Is Cool
item.description:
Writing is Cool!

This is a test sentence from my text editor, excited to start writing!
